Docs.summary: Emits the entire input as a single token. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

Docs.param: The name of the tokenizer. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

Docs.summary: The maximum token length. Default is 256. Tokens longer than the maximum length are split. The maximum token length that can be used is 300 characters.
